name: The Salad Bar
description: For those looking for healthy food in Colombo, the choices are limited, but The Salad Bar in Rajagiriya is looking to change that. They're a tiny stall that offers a range of salads at affordable rates. The best part is that they actually deliver.
review: For those looking for healthy food in Colombo, the choices are limited, but The Salad Bar is looking to change that. They're a small set up based in Dehiwala that offers a range of salads at affordable rates. The best part is that they deliver (through Quickee).
